entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then periods of snow. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 21. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022
